name: The Dweller
description: The Dweller is a puzzle game where you play as the MONSTER! It's time to get rid of all those pesky archaeologists snooping around in your lair. SCARE them, CRUSH them, DEVOUR them! ELIMINATE THE INTRUDERS!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 1.0 GHz Processor Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX compatible graphics DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 200 MB available space

reviews.review_text: I got this game in a big bundle among with some other games, I wanted to play all the games to make reviews < the game is very nice to play, it makes you able to think about strategy without you knowing about it. the graphics are great and the game is really fun to play, although in some levels it is too hard to finish the levels. Needs new level balancing for example, lvl 5 is harder then lvl 8 (not sure if these were the right lvl numbers)  tis game is good if you like to think about a good puzzle/ strategy 7/10 keep the work up! :D >

I enjoyed this game from beginning to end. The puzzles keep you thinking, the little men kept me laughing and the letters were enjoyable to read. It's to me an original gameplay, i hadn't played as a monster figuring out how to get around a cave and eat/crush or even scare little people, till now. This being the Devs first game, i am thoroughly impressed, it all fits so well together imo and i think he has done very well :)
Best adventurer game since Uncharted 4  8/10 would be a rock again
Neat little atmospheric indie puzzle game. Could use a lot of polish, but it's got potential and it's fun.
